# The `GIMatchTableExecutor` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Provides the logic to execute GlobalISel match tables, which are used by the instruction selector and instruction combiners as their engine to match and apply MIR patterns. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::GIMatchTableExecutor</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

Provides the logic to execute GlobalISel match tables, which are used by the instruction selector and instruction combiners as their engine to match and apply MIR patterns.

Definition at line 586 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/gimatchtableexecutor-h">GIMatchTableExecutor.h</a>.

### isBaseWithConstantOffset() {#a596366d4034015c0668d2070e597425f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool GIMatchTableExecutor::isBaseWithConstantOffset (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &amp; Root, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineregisterinfo">MachineRegisterInfo</a> &amp; MRI) const</>}
  labels = {["protected"]}>
Return true if the specified operand is a G&#95;PTR&#95;ADD with a G&#95;CONSTANT on the right-hand side.

GlobalISel&#39;s separation of pointer and integer types means that we don&#39;t need to worry about G&#95;OR with equivalent semantics.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/gimatchtableexecutor-h/#l00725">725</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/gimatchtableexecutor-h">GIMatchTableExecutor.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/gimatchtableexecutor-cpp/#l00045">45</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/gimatchtableexecutor-cpp">GIMatchTableExecutor.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### isObviouslySafeToFold() {#acc7375926290b7d52cce5ef2c03505f7}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool GIMatchTableExecutor::isObviouslySafeToFold (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp; MI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp; IntoMI) const</>}
  labels = {["protected"]}>
Return true if MI can obviously be folded into IntoMI.

MI and IntoMI do not need to be in the same basic blocks, but MI must preceed IntoMI.
